name: Pokémon Battle Ultimate
overview: As the game starts you will be given the basic intro and after that, you will be moved to the stadium where different kinds of battles happen soon. Perhaps you may have played the Pokemon Stadium games, which have numerous kinds of cool competitions in the form of battles. This game is similar to Pokemon Stadium. Select your Pokemon starts from the PC.. There are 426 Pokemon to choose from that are all level 100. The dream is to become the World Champion. You may have heard that every four years there is a tournament which is held in the Kanto World Stadium. This year and on this day you have the chance to become the Pokemon champion, if you are successful in battle within the stadium. You are playing the role of a young trainer, all the trainers are present in this stadium and have an equal chance of winning the big title of Champion of Pokemon. All of the trainers are eagerly waiting their turn to defeat you and the other trainers with their selected Pokemon. Features: • Awesome Graphics • Sprite changes • Difficulty increased • New area and gameplay • Mega Evolution in Battle • New Items • New Moves • Visible IVs • Physical/Special split
